title: Find a Homeopath

She was given a remedy and after a day of taking her symptoms had resolved and she was able to keep food down." Harry Neveski "My wife's aunt wanted a natural remedy for worsening nausea and vomiting with some diarrhoea, she was losing weight at an alarming rate. She was given a remedy and after a day of taking her symptoms had resolved and she was able to keep food down." Harry Neveski FIND A HOMEOPATH This website has been designed to introduce you to the healing potential of homeopathy and make it easier for you to find a qualified practitioner, who is regulated by one of the UK's homeopathic registering bodies. Suse has over 20 years experience working with individuals and families. She practices in Kensal Rise, North-West London. Would you like to find out whether she's the right homeopath for you?
